script.project: Pomeranian tries to be a Police

shots.name: First Frame - Sleeping Peacefully
shots.description: Pomeranian sleeps deeply in his bed, camera focuses on his adorable face
shots.framing: Close-up of face, blurred pillow background
shots.narrator_script: Meet Max, a small Pomeranian with a very big dream...

shots.name: Stretching and Yawning
shots.description: Alarm rings. Pomeranian jumps out of bed startled, ears up
shots.framing: Full shot of the room, bed in the center
shots.camera_movement: Quick camera movement from the startle
shots.narrator_script: Today would be different. Today he would be... a police officer.

shots.name: Grooming and Cleaning
shots.description: Pomeranian stretches, licks his face, looks at mirror with determination
shots.framing: Medium shot facing the mirror
shots.narrator_script: He had been waiting for this moment his whole life.

shots.name: Transition to Kitchen
shots.description: Pomeranian quickly grooms himself, brushes fluffy fur
shots.framing: Detail shot of grooming, lots of movement
shots.narrator_script: He had to look impeccable for his first day.

shots.name: Breakfast
shots.description: Pomeranian enters kitchen, jumps onto chair at the table
shots.framing: Wide shot of kitchen, small Pomeranian in big chair
shots.camera_movement: Smooth pan, camera from the side
shots.narrator_script: First, breakfast. A police officer needs energy.

shots.name: Decision - Epic Transformation
shots.description: Pomeranian eats dog food from bowl, looks happy but rushed
shots.framing: Top shot of the bowl, Pomeranian eating
shots.narrator_script: And lots of determination.

shots.name: Police Uniform Transformation
shots.description: Pomeranian puts on his first police uniform (a small badge)
shots.framing: Medium shot, Pomeranian looking at camera with pride
shots.narrator_script: The uniform. The badge of honor.

shots.name: Police Station Exterior
shots.description: Pomeranian exits through his house door, the street is big for him
shots.framing: Wide shot, small Pomeranian exiting through huge door
shots.narrator_script: On the way to the police station.

shots.name: Police Patrol
shots.description: Pomeranian walks on sidewalk, determined, crossing the street
shots.framing: Side tracking, level shot
shots.camera_movement: Tracking shot, keeps pace with Pomeranian
shots.narrator_script: Each step brought him closer to his destination.

shots.name: Chase Scene
shots.description: Pomeranian arrives at police station, big building, looks up amazed
shots.framing: Low angle, Pomeranian looking at building ceiling
shots.narrator_script: Finally. The police station.

shots.name: Epic Jump
shots.description: Pomeranian enters station, camera follows through automatic doors
shots.framing: Wide shot interior, police station
shots.narrator_script: Time to work.

shots.name: Arrest
shots.description: Pomeranian fully dresses: complete uniform, police cap
shots.framing: Medium shot, quick wardrobe montage
shots.narrator_script: Transformed. Officer Max was ready.

shots.name: Exhaustion Return
shots.description: Pomeranian patrols the streets, walks with important police attitude
shots.framing: Wide shot, Pomeranian on street, buildings in background
shots.narrator_script: First: surveillance. Max was prepared for anything.

shots.name: Bath/Relaxation
shots.description: Pomeranian examines a 'crime' (a knocked over trash can), intense detective
shots.framing: Close-up of Pomeranian sniffing, trash in background
shots.narrator_script: Crime scene analysis. Nothing would escape his eagle eye.

shots.name: Sleep Final
shots.description: Suddenly, Pomeranian sees something in the distance, ears perk up, enters chase mode
shots.framing: Medium shot, Pomeranian positions in running stance
shots.narrator_script: Wait. What was that?

shots.name: Action Sequence 1
shots.description: Epic chase: Pomeranian runs at maximum speed after a 'suspect'
shots.framing: Camera behind Pomeranian, dynamic movement
shots.narrator_script: The chase is on!

shots.name: Action Sequence 2
shots.description: Pomeranian makes an epic jump over an obstacle
shots.framing: Side angle, captures jump at its peak
shots.narrator_script: Nothing would stop him.

shots.name: Action Sequence 3
shots.description: Pomeranian catches the 'suspect', 'arrests' it (it's a stuffed toy or something harmless)
shots.framing: Medium shot, Pomeranian over his prey
shots.narrator_script: Crime solved!

shots.name: Return Home 1
shots.description: Return to station after exhausting day. Pomeranian enters staggering
shots.framing: Wide shot, exhausted Pomeranian entering
shots.narrator_script: Duty fulfilled. But the exhaustion... was real.

shots.name: Return Home 2
shots.description: Pomeranian collapses in chair, completely exhausted, tongue out
shots.framing: Close-up of exhausted face
shots.narrator_script: A long day. Very long.

shots.name: Return Home 3
shots.description: Quick montage: Pomeranian arrives home, takes off uniform
shots.framing: Quick cuts from different angles
shots.narrator_script: At home. Finally.

shots.name: Return Home 4
shots.description: Pomeranian gets into bath, warm water, visibly relaxes
shots.framing: Side shot in bathtub, steam around
shots.narrator_script: A bath to wash away the day.

shots.name: Return Home 5
shots.description: Pomeranian dries off, gets comfortable, walks toward his bed
shots.framing: Wide shot of room, Pomeranian walking slowly
shots.narrator_script: Tomorrow would be another day...

shots.name: Final Frame - Sleeping
shots.description: Pomeranian lies in his bed, turns around, is deeply asleep
shots.framing: Close-up of face, sleeping peacefully, return to beginning
shots.narrator_script: But for now, he rested with the satisfaction of a job well done. Max's dream... was reality.
